document_data.name: ''Seal of Righteousness''
document_data.creator: [[Laeral Silverhand]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''seal of righteousness''''' was a unique [[enchanted]] trinket crafted by [[Laeral Silverhand]] for [[Nayeli Goldflower]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was one of many pieces of so-called "[[Silverhand gear]]" crafted for [[adventurer]]s who helped to protect [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Description: The ''seal of righteousness'' was a precious medallion inlaid with unusually sharp [[gemstone]]s, which required Nayeli to handle it with care and respect. According to Silverhand, this was intended to draw a parallel with how Nayeli had to pay similarly close attention to her behavior and oath as a [[paladin]].
document_data.Powers: While the ''seal of righteousness'' was in her possession, Nayeli had good fortune in combat.
document_data.Notable Owners: * Nayeli Goldflower, a paladin of [[Tyr]] to whom Silverhand also gifted the ''[[halberd of swift admonition]]''.
